title: Introduction to Financial
author: D.Annand and H.Dauderis
disc: Financial Accounting is the process of recording, summarizing and reporting transactions and revenue-expense generations in a time period

title: How to win an arrgument
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
disc: This book teaches you a better way to win arguments without quarreling, squabbling, tussling, wrangling, bickering, raising your voice, losing your cool, or coming to blows.

title: How Successful People Think
author: John C.Maxwell
disc: Successful people often share certain thought patterns and attitudes that contribute to their achievements. They tend to have a proactive mindset, focusing on solutions rather than dwelling on problems.

title: Web Animation Using JavaScript
author: Julian Shapiro
disc: JavaScript animation can be an intimidating subject to tackle. Julian does an excellent job of presenting the material in this book

title: Access 2010 VBA Macro Programming
author: Richard Shepherd
disc: In Access, programming is the process of adding functionality to your database by using Access macros or Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) code.

title: Beginnig Programming for Dummies
author: Wallace Wang
disc: Beginning Programming for Dummies shows you how computer programming works without all the technical details or hard programming language.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad: Rich Dad's Prophecy
author: Robert T.Kiyosaki
disc: April 2017 marks 20 years since Robert Kiyosaki's Rich Dad Poor Dad first made waves in the Personal Finance arena. It has since become the #1 Personal Finance book of all time . translated into dozens of languages and sold around the world.

title: Give and Take
author: Adam Grant
disc: Give and Take just might be the most important book of this young century. As insightful and entertaining as Malcolm Gladwell at his best, this book has profound implications for how we manage our careers

title: Python and Tkinter programming
author: Jhon E.Grayson
disc: Python offers multiple options for developing GUI (Graphical User Interface). Out of all the GUI methods, tkinter is the most commonly used method.
